mapper.select: SELECT A.GROUP_ID , A.GROUP_NM , A.GROUP_CREAT_DE , A.GROUP_DC , IFNULL( B.CNT , 0 ) USRCNT FROM COMTNGROUPINFO A left outer join (SELECT GROUP_ID , COUNT(*) CNT FROM COMTNGROUPUSR GROUP BY GROUP_ID) B on A.GROUP_ID = B.GROUP_ID
SELECT GROUP_ID , GROUP_NM , GROUP_CREAT_DE , GROUP_DC FROM COMTNGROUPINFO WHERE GROUP_ID = '${GRPID}'
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNGROUPINFO SET CHANGE_DT = '${DT}' , GROUP_NM = '${GROUP_NM}' , GROUP_DC = '${GROUP_DC}' WHERE GROUP_ID = '${GROUP_ID}'
mapper.select: SELECT A.GROUP_ID , A.USR_ID , A.ADD_DT , B.USR_NM FROM COMTNGROUPUSR A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNUSERMNG B ON (A.USR_ID = B.USR_ID) WHERE A.GROUP_ID = '${GRP_ID}'
SELECT a.GROUP_ID , a.USR_ID , a.ADD_DT , b.GROUP_NM , b.GROUP_DC FROM COMTNGROUPUSR A left outer join COMTNGROUPINFO B on A.GROUP_ID = B.GROUP_ID WHERE USR_ID = '${USR_ID}'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNGROUPUSR ( GROUP_ID , USR_ID , ADD_DT ) SELECT a.GROUP_ID , b.USR_ID , '${DT}' FROM COMTNGROUPINFO a , COMTNUSERMNG b where a.GROUP_ID = '${GRP_ID}' and b.USR_ID = '${USR_ID}'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM COMTNGROUPUSR WHERE GROUP_ID = '${GRP_ID}' AND USR_ID = '${USR_ID}'
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM COMTNUSERMNG WHERE USR_ID = '${USR_ID}'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMTNGROUPUSR WHERE GROUP_ID = '${GRP_ID}' AND USR_ID = '${USR_ID}'
